nodes.title: Write a C/C++/Java program to perform input/output of all basic data types.
Write a C/C++/Java program to print Hello World.
Write a C/C++/Java program that takes hours and minutes as input, and calculates the total number of minutes.
Write a C/C++/Java program to print Hello World.
Write a C/C++/Java program to calculate the area & perimeter of the rectangle, and the area & circumference of the circle.
Write a C/C++/Java program to perform addition, subtraction, multiplication and division of two numbers.
Write a C/C++/Java program to return the absolute value of an integer.
Write a C/C++/Java program to enter two numbers and perform all arithmetic operations.
Write a C/C++/Java program to compute the perimeter and area of a rectangle with a height of 7 inches. and width of 5 inches.
Write a C/C++/Java program to find the quotient and remainder of a division
Write a C/C++/Java program that will print your name, your father and mother name in three separate lines
Write a C/C++/Java program to convert this temperature into Centigrade degrees.
Write a C/C++/Java Write a C Program to accept any character from user and display its ASCII number on screen.
Write a C/C++/Java program to find the third angle of a triangle if two angles are given.
Write a C/C++/Java program that will take three numbers from user and find their average.
Write a C/C++/Java program If a four-digit number is input through the keyboard, write a program to obtain the sum of the first and last digit of this number. (without loop)
Write a C/C++/Java program that calculates the volume of a sphere.
Write a C/C++/Java program to print your name, date of birth and mobile number.

If the marks obtained by a student in five different subjects are input through the keyboard, find out the aggregate marks and percentage marks obtained by the student. Assume that the maximum marks that can be obtained by a student in each subject is 100.
Write a C/C++/Java program to interchange values of two numbers without using third variable
Write a C/C++/Java program that takes minutes as input, and display the total number of hours and minutes.
Rameshâ€™s basic salary is input through the keyboard. His dearness allowance is 40% of basic salary, and house rent allowance is 20% of basic salary. Write a program to calculate his gross salary.
Write a C/C++/Java program to find out the square of a given number.
Write a C/C++/Java program to print Hello World.
Write a C/C++/Java Program to interchange values of two numbers using third variable.
Write a C/C++/Java program If a five-digit number is input through the keyboard, write a program to reverse the number. (without loop)
The distance between two cities (in km.) is input through the keyboard. Write a program to convert and print this distance in meters, feet, inches and centimeters.

Write a C/C++/Java program In a town, the percentage of men is 52. The percentage of total literacy is 48. If total percentage of literate men is 35 of the total population, write a program to find the total number of illiterate men and women if the population of the town is 80,000.
